Back to Ludwig van Beethoven

Ludwig van Beethoven

Sonata no. 12 in A-flat major, op. 26

1800–1801 · Biamonti 296

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 20' 30"

  • 1. Andante con variazioni
  • 2. Scherzo: Allegro molto
  • 3. Marcia funebre sulla morte d’un Eroe: Maestoso andante
  • 4. Allegro

Recommended editions

  • Neue Gesamtausgabe (Henle) · VII/2 · HN 4242 · Klaviersonaten / Band 1 · ed. Hans Schmidt
  • Associated Board · The 35 Piano Sonatas / Volume 2 · ed. Barry Cooper
  • Bärenreiter · BA 11842 · Sämtliche Sonaten für Klavier II · ed. Jonathan Del Mar
  • Bärenreiter · BA 11804 · ed. Jonathan Del Mar
  • Henle · HN 834 · Klaviersonaten Band II · ed. Norbert Gertsch / Murray Perahia
  • Henle · HN 835 · Klaviersonaten Band II · ed. Norbert Gertsch / Murray Perahia
  • Henle · HN 892 · ed. Norbert Gertsch / Murray Perahia
  • Könemann · K 108 · Sonaten II · ed. István Máriássy
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50428 · Klaviersonaten / Band 2 · ed. Peter Hauschild / Jochen Reutter
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50137 · ed. Peter Hauschild

1. Andante con variazioni

The theme is followed by five variations.

Duration: 8' 30"

Difficulty: 3

2. Scherzo: Allegro molto

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 3

3. Marcia funebre sulla morte d’un Eroe: Maestoso andante

Beethoven later orchestrated this movement for the incidental music to Leonore Prohaska (WoO 96).

Duration: 6'

Difficulty: 2.5

4. Allegro

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 3.5
